mapper.select: SELECT MTTN_EXAM_RSLT_ID mttnExamRsltId, RESCH_PAT_ID reschPatId, GENE_EXAM_SPCN_ID geneExamSpcnId, EXAM_NO examNo, GENE_EXAM_MTH_NM geneExamMthNm, CHRM_NO chrnNo, GENE_NM geneNm, GENE_VARI_ST_LOC_VAL geneVariStLocVal, GENE_VARI_END_LOC_VAL geneVariEndLocVal, DNA_STRND_VAL dnaStandVal, GENE_VARI_CLSF_NM geneVariClsfNm, GENE_VARI_TYP_NO geneVariTypNo, REF_ALLELE_SQNC_VAL refAlleleSqncVal, VARI_ALLELE_SQNC_VAL variAlleleSqncVal, MTTN_STAT_NO mttnStatNo, HGVSC_VAL hgvscVal, HGVSP_VAL hgvspVal, TOT_ALLELE_READ_CNT totAlleleReadCnt, REF_ALLELE_READ_CNT refAlleleReadCnt, VARI_ALLELE_READ_CNT variAlleleReadCnt, VARI_ALLELE_READ_RT variAlleleReadRt, EXON_LOC_VAL exonLocVal, INTRN_LOC_VAL intrnLocVal, TRSC_ID trscId FROM PMGERMUEM WHERE RESCH_PAT_ID = #{patientId}
SELECT CHRM_NO chrmNo, GENE_ST_LOC_VAL geneStLocVal, GENE_END_LOC_VAL geneEndLocVal FROM PMGEMCHRM ORDER BY SORT_SEQ

SELECT MCS.CSMC_ID csmcId -- COSMIC ID , MCS.MTTN_EXAM_RSLT_ID mttnExamRsltId , MCS.HGVSP_VAL hgvspVal -- Protein Change , MCS.GENE_VARI_OCCUR_CNT geneVariOccurCnt -- Occurrence FROM pmsdev.PMGERMUCS MCS WHERE MCS.MTTN_EXAM_RSLT_ID = #{geneExamSpcnId} -- 돌연변이검사결과ID (조회조건)

/* 유전자검사검체 리스트 - Sample List */ SELECT SMP.GENE_EXAM_SPCN_SEQ geneExamSpcnSeq -- 유전자검사검체순번 (Sample 순번) , SMP.GENE_EXAM_SPCN_ID geneExamSpcnNm -- 유전자검사검체ID (Sample ID) FROM ( SELECT SPC.GENE_EXAM_SPCN_ID , @ROWNUM := @ROWNUM + 1 AS GENE_EXAM_SPCN_SEQ FROM ( SELECT DISTINCT GESP.GENE_EXAM_SPCN_ID , PSCN.SPCN_COLEC_DT -- 검체채취일자 , MIN(PSCN.SPCN_COLEC_TM) OVER(PARTITION BY GESP.GENE_EXAM_SPCN_ID, PSCN.SPCN_COLEC_DT) AS SPCN_COLEC_TM -- 검체채취시각 FROM ( SELECT RESCH_PAT_ID, GENE_EXAM_SPCN_ID, GENE_READ_RSLT_VAL -- 연구환자ID, 유전자검사검체ID(Sample ID), 유전자판독결과값 FROM pmsdev.PMGERMUEM -- Mutations UNION SELECT RESCH_PAT_ID, GENE_EXAM_SPCN_ID, GENE_READ_RSLT_VAL -- 연구환자ID, 유전자검사검체ID(Sample ID), 유전자판독결과값 FROM pmsdev.PMGERCVEM -- Copy Number Alterations UNION SELECT RESCH_PAT_ID, GENE_EXAM_SPCN_ID, GENE_READ_RSLT_VAL -- 연구환자ID, 유전자검사검체ID(Sample ID), 유전자판독결과값 FROM pmsdev.PMGERSVEM -- Structural Variations UNION SELECT RESCH_PAT_ID, GENE_EXAM_SPCN_ID, PTEG_GENE_READ_RSLT_VAL AS GENE_READ_RSLT_VAL -- 연구환자ID, 유전자검사검체ID(Sample ID), 유전자판독결과값 FROM pmsdev.PMGERGNEX -- Expression ) GESP LEFT OUTER JOIN pmsdev.SSPJMPERC PERC -- 병리검사기본 ON GESP.GENE_EXAM_SPCN_ID = PERC.EXAM_NO -- 검사번호 LEFT OUTER JOIN pmsdev.SSSPMPSCN PSCN -- 병리검체의뢰기본 ON PERC.SPCN_GRP_NO = PSCN.SPCN_GRP_NO -- 검체그룹번호 WHERE 1=1 AND GESP.RESCH_PAT_ID = #{patientId} -- 연구환자ID (조회조건) AND GESP.GENE_READ_RSLT_VAL = 'Positive' -- 유전자판독결과값 ORDER BY PSCN.SPCN_COLEC_DT, PSCN.SPCN_COLEC_DT, GESP.GENE_EXAM_SPCN_ID ) SPC , ( SELECT @ROWNUM := 0 ) RNM ) SMP
WHERE SMP.GENE_EXAM_SPCN_SEQ = #{sampleId}
